channel.title: Control Interfaces on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Control Interfaces on PlaceOS

item.title: WorkMate
item.description: The first workplace management system to combine out-of-the-box simplicity with enterprise-level configuration & scalability

item.title: Room Booking
item.description: A simple, self-hosted room booking app you don’t pay per room per month, you own it

item.title: Desk Booking
item.description: Configurable desk booking management at scale without hardware lock-in

item.title: Canadian University Campus - Energy Reduction & Sustainability
item.description: This pilot examined the implementation of PlaceOS for automating and synchronizing separate building systems—security access, HVAC, AV, and others—integrated with the university’s scheduling system. The goal was to transform classrooms into smart spaces through enhanced automation capabilities.

item.title: Room Booking Updates: Recurring Booking & Room Manager
item.description: Learn about the new recurring bookings feature in our room booking app. Streamline your scheduling process and enhance room management with ease.

item.title: New Feature: Locking Booking
item.description: Explore PlaceOS’s Locker Booking System: Easy reservations, access control, visual booking, and flexibility for workplaces and visitor management.

item.title: Indoor Wayfinding for your Workplace
item.description: Enhance workplace navigation with indoor wayfinding technology. Explore how these solutions can streamline movement and boost productivity in your office.

item.title: Managing Technology Redundancy in IoT and Smart Buildings
item.description: Learn how to effectively deal with technology redundancy in IoT and smart buildings. Discover strategies to optimize systems and ensure continuous performance.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Understanding Energy Analytics, Surveys & Catering
item.description: A live demo about technical details behind our energy analytics tools, valuable insights from surveys & our catering tool.
